tooltip.aetheriusmod.espada_especial.shi: §7§oIts blade chooses the warrior — and refuses to be wielded by those without the soul of legend.§r
tooltip.aetheriusmod.cano.shift_down: §7§oOne fine day someone was walking down the street and saw a pipe, and picked up this pipe.§r
tooltip.aetheriusmod.experimento_646.shi: §7§oCreated for something greater, not to cut but to §r§8§k§oSave something greater.§r
tooltip.aetheriusmod.experimento_646: §7§oIt's not a weapon... it's a receptacle.§r
tooltip.aetheriusmod.aurora_hiberna.shif: §b§oImbued with ancient cold, it whispers promises of icy death.§r
tooltip.aetheriusmod.luz_da_ultima_fenix: §6§oForged in ashes. Reborn in light. Fire that's reborn, light that never dies.§r
tooltip.aetheriusmod.fulmens_fang.shift_: §3§oWho wields the Sword dances with thunder - for within its blade sleeps the storm, dreaming fiercely in the silence of steel.§r
tooltip.aetheriusmod.fulmens_fang: §oFrom the storm comes thunder, and from it comes the cut that tears the heavens.§r
tooltip.aetheriusmod.dark_judgment.shift: §4§oThe creation of §4§lDark Judgment §4§owas not an act of conscious creation, when souls began to wander in an endless limbo and the cycle of life was interrupted by those who defied their own mortality, a weapon was born from the very fabric of the Underworld.§r
tooltip.aetheriusmod.dark_judgment: §4§lDark Judgment §r§4§odoes not reap out of anger, but out of necessity. It rightes what has been twisted, it ends what is past its time, and it tears from existence all that refuses to accept the end.§r
tooltip.aetheriusmod.divine_silence.shif: §5§oBefore light, before even the concept of creation, there was the Void—not as absence, but as will. And from that will, a weapon was born. It was not forged by hands, nor summoned by ritual. Divine Silence simply came into being, as if the universe itself had made a mistake.§r
tooltip.aetheriusmod.divine_silence: §5§oWhere §5§lDivine Silence §r§5§oplays, even time hesitates, for before the Void, even the gods are silent.§r
tooltip.aetheriusmod.thyrsus.shift_down: §a§oForged from the forest's primordial will to maintain its perpetual rhythm of serenity.§r
tooltip.aetheriusmod.thyrsus: §2Your pulse is like a sap of hope§r
tooltip.aetheriusmod.alvorada_celeste.sh: §e§oBearer of the first ray that lit the cosmos. In the hands of the Goddess of Light, this blade raises civilizations, undoes decay, and reminds the world that as long as there is light, there will never be an end.§r
tooltip.aetheriusmod.protocolo_genesis.s: §7§oUsed once to begin the age of machines. It will be used again to end it.§r
tooltip.aetheriusmod.protocolo_genesis: §c§She doesn't cut. It erases. And replaces.§r
tooltip.aetheriusmod.thunderlash: §3§oA foice lendária que invoca a fúria dos céus a cada balanço.§r
tooltip.aetheriusmod.blood_regret.shift_: Viva como sangue sob a luz, responde à magia e às emoções de quem a empunha. Na empunhadura, um pequeno crânio de origem incerta observa em silêncio, como um lembrete imóvel de que o verdadeiro peso da espada não está no aço, mas no que ela exige de quem a carrega.
tooltip.aetheriusmod.blood_regret: Uma espada de lâmina carmesim que responde à emoção de quem a empunha. Na empunhadura, um crânio simboliza o fardo que ela representa.
